home.introSectionTitle: Tuni Toku - Your Tokusatsu Toy Paradise
home.introText: At Tuni Toku, we don't just sell toys; we share a passion. This is where you can find the DX Drivers and Henshin Belts you've always dreamed of, discover a unique collection of Gaia Memories and Vistamps, and own figures from the legendary Kamen Rider and Super Sentai series. Every item in our shop is an authentic Bandai product, carefully selected to ensure the best collecting experience.

footer.aboutText: Tuni Toku was born from a deep love for the world of Tokusatsu. Our mission is to be the leading reputable model shop, connecting the Kamen Rider and Super Sentai fan community in Vietnam, and providing high-quality Bandai products at reasonable prices. Join Tuni Toku to fulfill your collecting passion!

listProduct.categoryDescription: Discover and own authentic DX Drivers, Henshin Belts, and models from the Kamen Rider and Super Sentai series. Tuni Toku guarantees 100% genuine Bandai Japan products with nationwide shipping.
